message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with crowd motion analysis and abnormal event detection using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), which are commonly used in computer vision tasks such as image and video analysis. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel measure-based method that combines semantic information with low-level Optical-Flow, which involves machine learning techniques such as deep learning and feature extraction. This suggests that cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper deals with video analysis, which falls under cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
